description: Returns information about the nodes within a network. Applies to Hyperledger Fabric and Ethereum.

parameters.name: NetworkId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the network for which to list nodes.

parameters.name: MemberId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the member who owns the nodes to list. Applies only to Hyperledger Fabric and is required for Hyperledger Fabric.

nested_items.name: Nodes
nested_items.description: An array of NodeSummary objects that contain configuration properties for each node.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the node.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the node was created.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone in which the node exists.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The EC2 instance type for the node.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the node. For more information about ARNs and their format, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that indicates the next set of results to retrieve.
